actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from the gross income of interest on bank loans made to churches and religious organizations.
short_title: Community Faith-based Lending Improvement Act of 2003

summary.text: Community Faith-based Lending Improvement Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income interest received by banks on loans made to tax-exempt churches and religious organizations.

titles.title: Community Faith-based Lending Improvement Act of 2003
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from the gross income of interest on bank loans made to churches and religious organizations.
